headline: Textron (TXT): Evaluating the Upside as Bullish Earnings Forecasts Boost Investor Sentiment
summary: Textron (TXT) is attracting fresh investor attention as expectations grow for another upbeat quarterly performance. The company’s upcoming earnings report is in focus because of its track record of outperforming estimates. See our latest analysis for Textron. Textron’s latest share price of $86.85 reflects building momentum, as investors have responded positively to its track record of earnings beats and upbeat analyst sentiment. While total shareholder return over three years sits at an...
